hanzi-su-wiki:
増

Значения

Увеличиваться, повышаться; увеличивать

Мнемоника

Засыпать землёй 土 ямы на дороге, увеличивать 曾 слой земли.

Варианты

增
purpleculture_pinyin:
zēng
Japanese variant of 增
Японский вариант увеличения
rtega_mnemonic:
增增RS増increase
  • things growing 曾 on the ground 土 of the field 田 increase all the time
heisig_constituent: increase, soil, dirt, ground, increase, formerly, horns, rice field, brains, sun, day
heisig_story: This kanji depicts an increase of soil, multiplying so fast that it literally buries everything in its path.
koohiiStory1: Prices always INCREASE for LAND that was FORMERLY cheaper.
koohiiStory2: Farmers work the land so they can INCREASE their formerly puny crop supply.
kunYomi: ま.す、ま.し、ふ.える、ふ.やす
jp_example_words:
増強(ぞうきょう): augment, reinforce, increase
増進(ぞうしん): promoting, increase, advance
増やす(ふやす): to increase, to add to, to augment
増し(まし): extra, additional, less objectionable, better, preferable
激増(げきぞう): sudden increase
増加(ぞうか): increase, addition
増減(ぞうげん): increase and decrease, fluctuation
増大(ぞうだい): enlargement
増す(ます): increase, grow
増える(ふえる): increase
jp_readingExamples: 増える (ふ.える), 増やす (ふ.やす), 増す (ま.す)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The dirt mask is a mask which, when put on, will greatly increase the amount of dirt.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine putting it on, and suddenly the dirt around you increases by quite a bit.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Use the dirt mask to increase the dirt around you. The zombies (ぞう) are trying to escape, so you just keep increasing the dirt on top of them so they can't get out.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Zombie hands keep coming out of the ground, but as long as you wear the mask and increase the dirt on top of them, they won't be able to escape their earthly prison.
Ru_Radicals: 并, 土 (земля), 日 (день), 田 (рисовое поле)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: it was formerly (曽) ground (土) but now it's increased

Name meaning
The Japanese for "增" uses simplified Chinese characters.
zēng
вм. 增
Radicals: 土, 曽  (dirt, mask)
Meaning Mnemonic
The dirt mask is a mask which, when put on, will greatly increase the amount of dirt.
Imagine putting it on, and suddenly the dirt around you increases by quite a bit.
Reading Mnemonic
Use the dirt mask to increase the dirt around you. The zombies (ぞう) are trying to escape, so you just keep increasing the dirt on top of them so they can't get out.
Zombie hands keep coming out of the ground, but as long as you wear the mask and increase the dirt on top of them, they won't be able to escape their earthly prison.
